  • Method Details

    • generateEnchantments

      public EnchantResult generateEnchantments(org.bukkit.entity.Player enchanter, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, int enchantLevel, boolean table, long seed)
      Generates an enchantment result for the given item
      Parameters:
      enchanter - player enchanting the item (use null to bypass permissions)
      item - item to enchant
      enchantLevel - enchantment level (1-30 from the table)
      table - whether or not it is a table enchantment. If not a table enchantment maxLevel is used over maxTableLevel
      seed - enchanter's random seed for enchanting
      Returns:
      enchanting result

    • getAllValidEnchants

      public List<CustomEnchantment> getAllValidEnchants(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, org.bukkit.permissions.Permissible enchanter, int level, boolean table)
      Get all enchantments which can be applied to the given ItemStack
      Parameters:
      item - item to check for applicable enchantments
      level - modified enchantment level
      Returns:
      List of all applicable enchantments
